name: Swarm of Quippers
movement: swim 40 ft., cannot move on land
description: A medium-sized swarm composed of tiny aquatic quippers, known for their aggressive and voracious nature.
memorable: The swarm can deal typical damage, plus inflict bleeding wounds on its victims, creating a heightened sense of urgency during combat.
goals: These creatures aim to swarm and consume any living beings they come across underwater.
relations: Often encountered in schools or groups, they can be affected by larger aquatic predators.
environment: Typically found in underwater environments, relying on water for survival.
strengths: Advantage on attacks against injured foes, resistance to common damage types, and immunity to various conditions.
weaknesses: Easily dispersed if damaged sufficiently and can only exist underwater.
attacks: Bites with the ability to inflict significant piercing damage and cause ongoing bleeding.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy, allowing the swarm to more easily hit weakened foes.
senses: The swarm has heightened smell, giving them a Perception of 15 for detecting scents.
skills: Exceptional Stealth allows the swarm to sneak up on its targets.
additional_information: Can occupy and move through the space of other creatures.
Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Immune to conditions such as charmed, frightened, and stunned.
Must remain submerged, unable to survive on land.
Uses swarm tactics to overwhelm enemies with numbers.
